import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Fragment } from 'react' import { createProfile } from '../Actions/profile' import {Link,withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' export const CreateProfile = ({history}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', bio: '', githubusername:'', twitter:'', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const [displaySocialInputs,setDisplaySocialInputs] = useState(false) const { company, website, location, status, skills, bio, githubusername, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData const toggleSocialInputs = () => { setDisplaySocialInputs(!displaySocialInputs) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("you pressed") dispatch(createProfile(formData,history)) } const onChange= e => setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)}/> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && (
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
Go Back )}
) }
